name: YouTube Rainbow Progress Bar
additional_info:
October 20th 2022
- I'm moving my themes to the Stylus Extension due to Better Extension Options and Better Extension Developers. You can get the New Version of My Themes from my GitHub page at: https://github.com/MiahFuta/StylusThemes


May 27th 2022
- Added a Rainbow Color Cycle to the Heat Map
-- Still working on finding a way to have it just blend in with the bar, but no luck so far.
--- If too many people don't like this new change, then I will remove it, but I think it's nice. <3
